hero.name: Gabriel Ivan Setyaputra
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.bio: Software Engineer with experience in Flutter and React.js across mobile and web. Delivered improvements such as raising feedback response rates from 79% to 91%, increasing engagement from 11.5% to 29.4%, saving ~900 monthly man-hours in onboarding, and reducing deployment costs by RM 300‚Äì500.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I build reliable mobile and web solutions using Flutter, React.js, and TypeScript. My focus is on practical impact: improving engagement, reducing operational effort, and ensuring consistent UI/UX. I enjoy collaborating across teams and turning requirements into maintainable software.

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Informatics Engineering

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Selected work across mobile and web reflecting real contributions and measurable outcomes.

grabMexApp.title: Grab Mex Mobile App
grabMexApp.description: Merchant experience app featuring AI Assistant integration (WebView) and dynamic content via JSON SDUI.
achievements: Improved user feedback response rates from 79% to 91%.
Increased engagement from 11.5% to 29.4% through dynamic content.
Reduced server load and costs with AI Assistant integration and a web-based LottiePlayer.

grabPos.title: Grab - Hubbo POS

achievements: Reduced deployment time and saved RM 300‚Äì500 in setup fees.
Led design system creation and upgraded Flutter to v3.3.10 for UI consistency.
Reduced support tickets by over 53% with a diagnostic tool.

mexOnboarding.title: Mex Onboarding Platform
mexOnboarding.description: Web modules for merchant onboarding with dynamic translation features and universal UI components.
achievements: Saved approximately 900 monthly man-hours with enhanced translation features.

Streamlined onboarding with a universal component base.

crmSystem.title: Comprehensive CRM System
